document.full_text: major league baseball emerged from the recession with a 7 percent jump in the average value of a team this year to an all-time high of $523 million, forbes magazine said wednesday.
document.title: major league teams worth more than ever: forbes
lines_and_colors: major league baseball emerged from the recession with a 7 percent jump in the average value of a team this year to an all-time high of $523 million, forbes magazine said wednesday.
